tool_description: The Verification Suite consists of various verification solutions including User Authentication and Document Data Extraction.

api_list.name: GST Certificate Verification
api_list.description: Get GST details using the GSTIN.

api_list.name: Vehicle Registration Certificate Verification -Plus (India)
api_list.description: Verify Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) number against Vahan vehicle database and fetch vehicle details.

api_list.name: Indian Document Image Validator
api_list.description: Perform real-time validation checks on the ID document submitted by a user.

api_list.name: Indian Pan Card Data Extraction
api_list.description: Extraction of details from image of an individual or company PAN card in real-time.

api_list.name: Indian Driving License Data Extraction
api_list.description: Extraction of details from image of an Indian driving license in real-time.

api_list.name: Name compare (sync)
api_list.description: Compare two names and return a match score on a scale of 1 to 5.

api_list.name: Face liveness check (sync)
api_list.description: Check if the face in the image is a picture of a living person.

api_list.name: Face compare (sync)
api_list.description: Compare two face images and produce a match score.

api_list.name: FSSAI License Verification
api_list.description: Verify food and beverage production license issued by the Indian government.

api_list.name: Vehicle Registration Certificate Verification - Basic (India)
api_list.description: Verify Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) number against Vahan vehicle database.

api_list.name: Indian PAN Card Verification
api_list.description: Get individual/company PAN verified from NSDL database.

api_list.name: Indian Driving License Verification
api_list.description: Verify Indian Driving license details with government databases.
